clite.parser

Class Lexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • clite.parser.Lexer

  • public class Lexer
extends java.lang.Object
    Turns a given file into a token stream

      • chkOpt

        private Token chkOpt(char c,
           Token one,
           Token two)
        Checks if `c` is `two`'s value and, if it is, skips the current character and returns `two`. If it isn't the value of `two`, `one` is returned.
        Parameters:
        c - Character to check for
        one - Return if c isn't two's value
        two - Value to check for character
        Returns:
        two if c is two's value, one otherwise

      • concat

        Returns:
